sources.title: Showdown In Manila | Full Movie | Action Crime Adventure | Casper Van Dien
sources.description:
Showdown In Manila - Private detectives Nick (Alexander Nevsky) and Charlie (Casper Van Dien) live and work in Manila amidst a corrupt police force.  When  a  murder investigation  leads  them  to  the  jungle  camp of an international terrorist, Nick and Charlie must assemble a team of mercenaries to take him and his army of thugs down.
2016.  Stars: Alexander Nevsky, Casper Van Dien, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Mark Dacascos, Tia Carrere
*Licensed from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved*

sources.title: Showdown In Manila | Full Action Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Showdown In Manila - Private detectives Nick (Alexander Nevsky) and Charlie (Casper Van Dien) live and work in Manila. A murder investigation leads them to the jungle camp of an international terrorist called The Wrath. Not trusting the police, Nick and Charlie assembly a team of daredevils to walk straight into the Wrath's lair and fight an army of his goons.

2016
Stars: Alexander Nevsky, Casper Van Dien, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa

metadata.Plot: Due to a delayed flight a group of German flight passengers have to wait in the hall of the airport of Manila. The crowd is quite mixed, ranging from an cultivated east German teacher couple up to sleazy sex tourists. As the waiting prolongs, more and more aggressions and long repressed behaviors shed their way to the surface.
metadata.Actors: Eddi Arent, Ana Capri, Margit Carstensen
